Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Robert', 3: 'Humans starve, humans die, humans get sad, and humans also make friends.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Robert', 3: "Oh, don't forget to disassemble me before selling my parts. My circulatory energy capsule is a universal one, so it should be able to fetch a high price.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Robert', 3: "As her friend, I don't wish for her to experience the first three things so soon, and never to if possible.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Robert', 3: "As for me... I still don't quite know what it means to be alive. After all, I'm not human.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Robert', 3: 'Though from what I can see, surviving is no small feat for humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: 'Robert was not prey. We never saw him as prey.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "Do you remember that winter when we almost couldn't make it? Robert... He made a decision back then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "We didn't disassemble him. We couldn't, mentally nor physically.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: 'So he decided to tear off his own energy capsule and created the hunting grounds in the foundation pit.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: 'He used the Corrupted, used the Punishing Virus concentration scale to achieve self-hunting and disassembled himself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "We didn't mean to make the hunting grounds.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Garrison', 3: "But it's also true that we didn't put an end to it.", 4: '1'}
